roleset.name: make a noise like a dove
roleset.note: COO-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from coo.01-v)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: There have been cooing doves , chattering magpies , thieving jackdaws , aproud peacock , a silly goose , and a harpy eagle -- whom I was silly enough[*] to mate with [*T*-2]and who [*T*-1] is now [*-3] busy tearing at my vitals'' .
And then a quote gang of three female jurors were such rabid Jackson fans that they cooed not my Michael when the panel discussed the felony charges against the pop idol.
example.arg: when the panel discussed the felony charges against the pop idol.
